mapper.sql: id, worknamesall, starttime, endtime, yuliu1, yuliu2, createTime, createName, updateTime, updateName,auditorState,userid
mapper.select: select worknamesall from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal where id=#{wntid}

select aw.id, worknamesall, starttime, endtime, auditorState, userid, awa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal aw, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_works_auditor awa where aw.id = awa.object_id AND objectType = 1 and aw.id=#{id} AND awa.auditor_id = #{receiverid}

select aw.id, worknamesall, starttime, endtime, auditorState, userid, awa.auditor_id from mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal aw, mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_works_auditor awa
aw.id = awa.object_id AND objectType = 1
and worknamesall like concat ('%',#{workname},'%')
GROUP BY id DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal
id,
worknamesall,
starttime,
endtime,
yuliu1,
yuliu2,
createTime,
createName,
updateTime,
updateName,
auditorState,
userid,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{worknamesall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditorState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal
worknamesall = #{worknamesall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createName = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateName = #{updatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditorState = #{auditorState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_worknametotal set worknamesall = #{worknamesall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yuliu1 = #{yuliu1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yuliu2 = #{yuliu2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
